about_the_game:
The Caribbean is yours to conquer in Pirates of Black Cove, where cunning, might, and a dash of chaos are your greatest tools. Choose from a lineup of daring pirate captains, each with unique skills, and rally the three pirate factions—Pirates, Corsairs, and Buccaneers—under one flag to overthrow the dreaded Pirates of Black Cove.

Roam a vibrant open world as you sail the seas, storming enemy ships, looting treasures, and taking on missions that build your notoriety. Develop your strongholds to recruit a fearless crew, brew bizarre alchemical potions, and upgrade your fleet with the most outrageous weapons ever to grace a pirate world.

When the cannon smoke clears, the real battles begin. Command both land and sea skirmishes, wielding a variety of units and wacky weaponry to outsmart your enemies. Whether you’re laying siege to a colonial fortress or sending rival pirate ships to a watery grave, the Caribbean will soon be yours to rule.

Features:

  • Rule the Caribbean: Unite Pirate, Corsair, and Buccaneer factions to unlock legendary heroes and abilities.

  • Customize Your Fleet: Equip your ships with bizarre and explosive weaponry to devastate enemies on the high seas.

  • Build Your Strongholds: Manage and expand pirate bases to strengthen your forces and brew powerful potions.

  • Land and Sea Combat: Take the fight to your foes in dynamic, over-the-top battles across the Caribbean.

  • Choose Your Captain: Lead with style by selecting from a range of bold pirate leaders with unique skills.

  • Infamy and Notoriety: Gain fame, terrorize your foes, and rise to the throne as King of All Pirates.

Set your course for mischief, mayhem, and mastery as you turn the Caribbean into your personal playground in Pirates of Black Cove!

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS *: Windows XP/Vista/7
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core Duo or equivalent processor
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Hard Disk Space: 4 GB hard disk space
  • Video Card: GeForce 8600 or equivalent Video Card (256 MB of dedicated memory with support for pixel shader 3.0)
  • DirectX®: 9.0
  • Sound: DirectX 9.0 Compatible Sound Card
  • Additional: 3-button mouse, keyboard and speakers

short_description: Plunder your way to the top and claim the title of Pirate King. This humorous mix of adventure and strategy lets you unite pirate factions, manage strongholds, and dominate land and sea battles. Raid, recruit, and wreak havoc across the Caribbean in your quest for ultimate infamy.
